short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control HBO Max volume using mouse wheel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super tiny extension that simply gives you a way to control the volume of videos on HBO Max using your mouse wheel which is cool when you're focused on the content and don't want to interrupt your experience by having to click on the volume button.

Note: Adjusting volume with the scroll wheel does not visually update the volume bar. Any subsequent volume adjustment using the keyboard's up/down arrow keys will by default revert to the volume level shown on the volume bar.
